thread.title: Global Economy Week Ahead: U.K. GDP, Eurozone PMI, Bank of Japan Meeting

author: WSJ Staff
title: Global Economy Week Ahead: U.K. GDP, Eurozone PMI, Bank of Japan Meeting
text:
The week ahead will feature U.K. data on gross domestic product as well as eurozone figures on private-sector economic activity. In the U.S., many data releases may be postponed—including a report on fourth-quarter GDP scheduled for Friday—while the federal government remains shut down amid an impasse over spending and immigration.
